General.Name: Uniquest
General.Description: Uniquest Corporation distributes electronic components in South Korea and internationally. The company offers 3D multimedia, sensor, and wireless solutions; power products, and communication ICs and PLDs for networking system and communications; and semiconductor solutions for digital consumers, such as media center, smart TV, and smart home. It also provides design, logistics, and technical support services, as well as consulting and training services. The company was formerly known as Uniquest Korea, Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Uniquest Corporation in 2003. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.

1.Name: Mr. Geun-Bae  Lee
1.Title: Chief Financial Officer, VP and Exec. Director
